item.title: SHINING 3D Expands FreeScan Omni into a Modular Metrology Series
item.description: SHINING 3D launches the FreeScan Omni, a modular wireless 3D scanning platform designed to improve mobile metrology workflows.

item.title: 5-Axis Measurement Cuts Inspection Time Without Cutting Accuracy
item.description: 5-axis CMM technology reduces inspection time while maintaining precision for complex parts, enhancing manufacturing throughput.

item.title: Metallo Accelerates Inspection Efficiency 30 Percent by Automating Measurements
item.description: Metallo Ltd increased inspection efficiency by 30% using the Baty Velo FV automated optical measurement system.

item.title: Automation Momentum Builds as Manufacturers Boost Robot Investment
item.description: North American robot orders rose 6.6% in 2025, reflecting strong investment in automation across diverse manufacturing sectors.

item.title: Is Good Help Hard to Find? It Depends on Whom You Ask
item.description: VSD survey reveals ongoing challenges in hiring experienced machine vision engineers despite a slight decline in perceived shortages.

item.title: Medical Device Manufacturers Redefine Quality
item.description: Medical device manufacturers are transforming inspection processes and supplier management to meet new quality demands amidst digital and regulatory pressures.

item.title: Siemens Targets Sub-Nanometer Era with AI Metrology Acquisition
item.description: Siemens acquires Canopus AI to enhance semiconductor manufacturing precision with computational and AI-driven metrology solutions for wafer inspection.
